thread.title: Ranae
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Ranae

author: Ranae
title: Ranae
text: My husband and I went to Tamarindo, Costa Rica for two glorious weeks! I have been wanting to go for over 25 years to go zip lining there. Not only did we zip line, we did many other wonderful activities that I can now check off my bucket list! What a beautiful town and everyone we encountered there was over-the-top friendly and helpful. We look forward to future trips to Costa Rica. Our travel consultant, Ruve Pire could not have set up a better trip for us!!
